Name: Bananas & Cream
Ingredients: 60 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: Banana and cream frappé with hints of almond. One for a summer afternoon.
Nutrition: One serving of Bananas & Cream contains 500 calories
